name: Ursuga Warcaller
aura: Increases Ally HP in all battles by 33%.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 1 turn.

Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Decrease C.DMG] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns on targets whose ATK is higher than their DEF. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff and a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns on targets whose ATK is equal to or lower than their DEF.
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Decreases the damage all allies receive from critical hits by 30%. This Champion will receive that damage instead.
